author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the running of the legacy AK8 ParticleNet mass regression in the Nano step on Run2 UL MiniAODs, which was accidentally removed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44507.

#### PR validation:

Tested with nano matrix.
title: Fix ParticleNetLegacy when running Nano on Run2UL samples
